title: Did Peter Fonda suggest that Baron Trump be kidnapped?
subtitle: The representative apologized for saying that the 12-year-old son of Donald Trump should be placed in a "cage with the cravings of children" as a protest against the President's immigration policy.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In June 2018, Peter Fonda suggested in a tweet that Baron Trump should be kidnapped, protesting against the President ' s immigration policy.
